void showUserInterface()
Asks the view to turn itself visible.

getInstance

Instance getInstance(MyWeakReference ref)
Asks for a representation of an instance by its weak reference to the model and creates a new instance if it doesn't exist.

Parameters:
ref - Weak reference of the wanted representation of instance
Returns:
the representation of the instance

existInstance

boolean existInstance(MyWeakReference ref)
Asks the model if the wanted instance already exists.

Parameters:
ref - Weak reference of the wanted representation of instance
Returns:
true if the instance already exists, false otherwise

getThreadFlow

ThreadFlow getThreadFlow(java.lang.String threadName,
                         java.lang.String threadFriendlyName)
Verifies if the flow of the current thread already exists and creates a new one if it does not exist.

Parameters:
threadName - name of the current thread
threadFriendlyName - re-writable name of the thread (by toString method)
Returns:
instance of ThreadFlow for the current thread

getThreadFlows

java.util.Vector<ThreadFlow> getThreadFlows()
Asks the model for the vector with all the thread flows.

Returns:
vector with all of the ThreadFlow instances
